page.shortlink: api desktop api xdialog commands units
page.description: Defines the units of measure. The default is inches.

argument.name: Unit
argument.description: Character. There are five allowed values: "D" = default (Arial, 8 point) "P" = pixels "I" = inches "C" = centimeters "F" = use current font for line and character spacing

section.title: Discussion
section.description: The {UNITS} command specifies the unit of measurement to be used when sizing Xdialog controls.
